pma:database.name: eaton
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `reports` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `devicename` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `macaddress` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `datetime` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `tbl_events` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eventid` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `devicename` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `macaddress` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `datetime` datetime(6) NOT NULL, `remarks` varchar(200) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
